metadata.name: Winrar Execution in Non-Standard Folder
metadata.comment: Detects a suspicious winrar execution in a folder which is not the default installation folder

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\rar.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\winrar.exe'))) AND lower(device.desc) = lower('command line rar') AND NOT (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\unrar.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\\\program files (x86)\\\\winrar\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\\\program files\\\\winrar\\\\'))) AND NOT contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\\\windows\\\\temp\\\\')))

output.summary: Detects a suspicious winrar execution in a folder which is not the default installation folder

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate use of WinRAR in a folder of a software that bundles WinRAR Reference: https://twitter.com/cyb3rops/status/1460978167628406785
